mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoClbc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CLBC_ID , CLBC_REG_DT , CLBC_DSTB_DT , CLBC_PHON , CLBC_RECPTN_PHON , CLBC_PRCS_STAT_CD , CLBC_PRCS_STAT_NM , CLBC_COMPT_DT , CNSLT_ADMIN_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CLBC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CLBC_ID = #{clbcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoClbc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_CLBC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CLBC_ID = #{clbcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
